impression: [item] Acute appendicitis, with dilatation of the appendix to 1.3 cm in maximal diameter, wall thickening and enhancement, and 1.1 cm appendicolith near the base of the appendix. No evidence of perforation or abscess formation at this time. The appendix is retrocecal in nature. Associated free fluid tracks into the right hemipelvis. [item] Mild associated wall thickening noted at the adjacent cecum.
